授業目的: The course aims at strengthening your confidence in using English for communication. By the end of this term, you should have improved your skills in written and oral communication in English.
到達目標: 1) The student can compose and communicate a clearly formulated and persuasive message orally and in writing. 2) The student masters the paragraph format and can present, analyze and discuss information in an academically acceptable format. 3) In oral presentations the participant can convey her/his messages to others.
授業方法: 授業開 注　学院の方針に従って授業は教室で行うが、認められるニーズあれば、平行同時双方向型オンライン授業で実施予定だ。

第1回: 10 April. Introduction to the course and the course book. Understand how to make a peer review. First assignment: Download your online identity as chatGTP sees it, add corrections visibly, and post the result on Luna. Deadline 13 April.
For next week, read the self-presentations by your classmates, peer review at least three of them. Revise your own composition based on your peers' comments. Deadline 16 April.
第4回:
Prepare a 5-minute argumentative talk. 
Complete practices assigned
トピック.授業計画1: 10 April, Introduction to the course and the course book. First assignments to be posted on LUNA. The subsequent classes are based on the course book but will also require two individual oral presentations in class. Outside of the classroom you are asked to complete a number of exercises.
トピック.授業外学習2: Expect about 4 hours of homework per week.  Copying is illegal, quoting is alright. If for some reason I find you are copying text, the first time you will be warned, the next you will fail. The internet is full of useful and useless information, including ready-made essays. It is fine to learn from such information, but unless you are the original author, you cannot get the credit for it.
